title: Sophie & Kia Albums and EPs
description:
These are the very hard to find albums and EPs of the duo Sophie & Kia. Sophie Bennett and Kia Luby played Stevie and Kristi from from The Saddle Club.

Included are the complete singles for He's Everything and Planet Tokyo, complete with music videos. The only track I'm missing from Spin is the first track, which is a four-second clip of Sophie shouting "Wrong way!" and Kia saying "Go back!". As for the acoustic album Raw Beauty, it was very difficult to acquire any form of it so I only have three songs. Oh, and between the album and singles, there are a couple song repeats.

Hope you all enjoy!

128kbps or better, mp3, videos are mp4

He's Everything
1. He's Everything
2. I'd Rather Be With You
3. Sometimes
4. Believe

These were so difficult to track down!
A thank you would be wonderful. :D
